comment: I took this class during the summer semester, although on a faster pace, syllabus and assignments were very straightforward and simple. Mainly short discussions posts where it is mandatory to reply after doing a reading on a chapter and listening to a virtual lecture. Very simple class and very literature comprehensive!

comment: This prof makes the content interesting even despite it being a lot of information to take in. This class has no exams however, it has three writing based assignments. Friendly, and responds well to emails. I suggest taking this prof because it has been a fun class and she gives extra credit.
i dont trust that i actually learned much because of how low-stakes and easy everything was. lots of extra credit. feels like she's just trying to be liked and rated highly because of easy A's.

Prof. Vause was my first AH course, and I enjoyed every minute. You have to submit a hand-drawn sketch with analysis weekly. Plenty of extra credit opportunities. The textbook was necessary for homework, online being the cheapest. Within the semester, there are three essays, each fairly easy. Very understanding about absences, just email her.

Professor Vause knows exactly what she's teaching and overall gives helpful feedback. There's three writing assignments than span throughout the semester and they're not hard to get A's on. The weekly homework is also extremely easy as well. I would absolutely recommend taking her for this course.

Prof. Vause really knows her stuff in art history, she made all her presentations and teaches them SO well. No quizzes or tests, but weekly journal entries from the textbook. There was one writing assignment that spanned the semester. Her presentations are engaging and fun- I HIGHLY recommend this professor for Art History.

ARH 4300 was one of the most interesting art history classes I've taken. Lectures are very interesting and there are no tests. Dr. Vause is an excellent professor and genuinely cares about each student's success. If you need art history credits, take her classes!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Accessible outside class
